import React from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import EntryService from '../../app/services/entryService' import Card from '../../components/card' import FormGroup from '../../components/form-group' import SelectMenu from '../../components/selectMenu' import LocalStorageService from '../../app/services/localStorageService' class AddReact extends React.Component { state = { id: null, description: '', year: '', month: '', value: '', type: '', status: '' } constructor() { super() this.service = new EntryService() } handleChange = (event) => { const value = event.target.value const name = event.target.name this.setState({ [name]: value }) } save = () => { const currencyUser = LocalStorageService.getItem('_usuario_logado') const { description, year, month, value, type } = this.state const entry = { description, year, month, value, type } } render() { const months = this.service.getMonthList() const types = this.service.getTypeList() return (
) } } export default withRouter(AddReact)
